name: Duck And Run (1.0)
description:
This is my first complete own made game. 

The first version (1.0) includs everything you need but I´m now looking for bugs so please comment if theres a bug.  You can also play it on https://play.unity.com/u/yangchang09, currently I´m working on a mobile version for ios, so look forward to the future ;) .

Have fun while playing this Game.

Controls: 

Standard: right arrow = walk right

 left arrow = walk left 

space key = jump 

Endless:

 space key = jump
